title: Hybrid Architectural Design Studio: Practice-Based Projects Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural design knowledge and fundamental CAD software proficiency
context.additional_context: Providing flexible learning environments for in-service professionals through blended (face-to-face/online) classes, establishing real-time collaboration and asynchronous feedback systems using digital devices.

learning_goals: In a blended learning environment, independent performance of hybrid architectural design processes at an 80% or higher proficiency level using digital tools (3D modeling, BIM software).
Completion of team-based design projects through in-person/remote collaboration scenarios, incorporating feedback from online platforms at least three times.
Analysis of post-pandemic architectural design trends to propose at least two design strategies considering sustainability and technology integration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
